name: What's in the Dark
description:
Global Game Jam 2020 Submission: https://globalgamejam.org
Theme: Repair

A little top down survival game where the aim of the game is to cut down wood to feed the fire. But be careful of what is hiding in the dark!

Controls:

  • WASD to move around
  • Space to interact

Tutorial:

  • Chop down trees by walking towards them and interacting with them
  • Pick up wood by walking over it. You can only carry one at a time
  • Chuck the wood into the fire by interacting with the fire
  • Putting wood into the fire will increase it's life
  • Interacting with the fire without wood in your hand will craft a torch
  • Place torches by pressing space with it in your hand
  • As the fire grows weaker the light will dim.
  • Being in the dark is detrimental to your health...

Submission Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/whats-dark-9
